title: Sr. VVilliam Killigrew his answer to the fenne mens objections against the Earle of Lindsey his drayning in Lincolnshire
author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.
notes: Folded broadside: The Earle of Lindsey his title by which himselfe, and his participants to claime 24000 acres of land in the fennes in Lincolne shire.
Imperfect: folded broadside lacking on film.
Robert Bertie, the first earl of Lindsey, was responsible for draining the fens.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
